experiences.description: Developed and maintained ETL pipelines for data ingestion from various sources into the company's data warehouse. Implemented data quality checks and monitoring systems to ensure data accuracy. Collaborated with data scientists to provide data for machine learning models.

Led the design and implementation of a new data warehouse using AWS Redshift. Developed scalable data pipelines using Spark and Hadoop. Mentored junior data engineers. Improved data pipeline efficiency by 30% through optimization techniques.

Currently leading a team of data engineers in building and maintaining data pipelines for a large-scale data analytics platform. Responsible for data architecture, data modeling, and data governance. Working with stakeholders to understand their data needs and provide solutions. Migrated on-premise data infrastructure to cloud-based solution, resulting in significant cost savings.

education.description: Focused on database systems and data mining. Conducted research on data compression algorithms.
Participated in an exchange program focusing on data analytics and machine learning. Gained experience with various data analysis tools and techniques.
